3: ...This is an important dinner. All the important figures will be here. I want to introduce everyone to the gracious support known as my family with this opportunity.
Oh, honey, we're a family. This is what I should do, right? Children?
Mother, I want to wear that handmade white dress to the dinner!
Of course, you're a perfect match for that dress with your beauty. Ah but, where did I put that dress again? Liv, Liv!
Liv, can you help Mother find that white dress of mine? Think you can handle it?
